item.title: MoveOnUp.org was never supposed to happen
item.description: This weekend, MoveOnUp.org held its first conference. The location was the Crowne Plaza Hotel at the airport. The event launched the Sherman T. Parker Scholarship for African-American Political Science students. But that’s not the big story. The big story is this: MoveOnUp.org has cheated history. Why “cheated?” Because the past 50 years of American liberal history has prepared American blacks for one purpose: compliance. Using victimhood, welfare, crime, destructive education, and programs designed to destroy families, American liberals from Ted Kennedy to Barack Obama chained African-Americans to “Uncle Sam’s Plantation,” as Star Parker so aptly puts it.
